hook.text: A daycare fined parents for picking up kids late. Late pickups increased. The fine became a fee to pay for.

buildup.text: Incentives are the rewards or punishments that shape behavior. They drive nearly everything people do.

discovery.text: Financial incentives work: tax deductions for charity, bonuses for performance, fines for pollution.

twist.text: But badly designed incentives backfire. Rewarding teachers for test scores led to cheating scandals.

punchline.text: Show me the incentive and I'll show you the outcome.

quiz.question: Why did fining late parents at a daycare increase tardiness?
options: The fine removed guilt and became a price for extra time
Parents didn't know about the fine
